configuration.name: Issues by tracker/status
configuration.query: select "status_id", "tracker_id", count(*), status."name", tracker."name" from "issues" join "issue_statuses" status on "status_id" = status."id" join "trackers" tracker on "tracker_id" = tracker."id" where "project_id" = %{#project.id} group by "status_id", "tracker_id"
